goal.en: "To train student to be able to recognize rocks and expand their knowledge about rocks, then understand rock forming causes and processes and explore the dynamic earth through the rocks."
goal.ch: 讓同學具備岩石分類的常識及野外鑑識的能力，進一步瞭解岩石的形成的原因及過程，藉由岩石的記錄探討地球變動的歷史！

content.en:
"1. mineralogic assemblage and composition of rock, rock occurrence and microscopic structures.
2. rock classifications
3. rocks and tectonics"
content.ch: 岩石的礦物組成、化學成份、產狀、岩象構造、生成環境與岩石分類的關係，進而使同學了解地殼演化的過程。

textbook.en: "Petrology-Igneous, Sedimentary, and Metamorphic, 3rd ed., by Harvey Blatt, Robert J. Tracy and Brent E. Owens, W. H. Freeman and Company, 2006."
textbook.ch: "教科書: Petrology-Igneous, Sedimentary, and Metamorphic, 3rd ed., by Harvey Blatt, Robert J. Tracy and Brent E. Owens, W. H. Freeman and Company, 2006. 參考書: 陳汝勤、莊文星，岩石學，聯經，1992 莊文星，臺灣之火山活動與火成岩，1999"
